sentences.sContent: I think he misses her terribly. You might cheer him up.
sentences.sCn: 我觉得他太想念她了。你也许能使他振作起来。

sentences.sContent: I wrote that song just to cheer myself up.
sentences.sCn: 我写了那首歌只是让自己振作起来。

synos.tran: 使高兴；高兴起来；使振奋

trans.tranOther: When you cheer up or when something cheers you up, you stop feeling depressed and become more cheerful
